text: is a Japanese politician. He is a member of the House of Representatives in the Diet. He was Chief Cabinet Secretary and Minister of Economy, Trade and Industry in the Democratic Party of Japan (DPJ) between 2010 and 2012.Reuters, "Japan picks Edano as trade min after predecessor gaffe ", 11 September 2011 He was the head of the Constitutional Democratic Party of Japan from 2017 until 2021. ==References== Category:1964 births Category:Living people Category:Foreign ministers of Japan Category:Tochigi Prefecture Category:Chief Cabinet Secretaries of Japan Category:Ministers of economy, trade and industry of Japan
title: Yukio Edano
